subject: Parameter in JUnit!
msgSnippet: It is known that Junit doesn t support pass some parameters to certain testmethod or return sth., right? However, I want to write certain class which is at
messageBody:
It is known that Junit doesn't support pass some parameters to certain
testmethod or return sth., right?

However, I want to write certain class which is at setUp() method to
make different testclass sharing the same instaince and passing some
parameters. Is this possible?
